title: Processing Assessment

elements.name: intro_text
elements.title:
Welcome to the Processing Assessment

This assessment measures your speed of processing new information and your adaptability when switching between tasks. You will complete interactive tasks and self-reflective questions.

elements.name: self_perceived_processing_speed
elements.title: How quickly do you typically process new information?

elements.name: handling_complex_information
elements.title: How comfortable are you processing large amounts of complex information at once?

elements.name: preferred_processing_approach
elements.title: When you process information, do you prefer to take your time for accuracy, or move quickly for efficiency?

elements.name: overwhelm_with_information
elements.title: How often do you feel overwhelmed when processing large amounts of information?

elements.name: adaptability_to_task_switching
elements.title: How easily do you adapt your processing speed when switching between different types of tasks?

elements.name: detail_oriented_focus
elements.title: I often find myself focusing on small details, even when it's not productive.

elements.name: problem_solving_style
elements.title: When solving problems, I prefer using logical steps over creative thinking.

elements.name: decision_making_style
elements.title: When making decisions, I tend to rely more on intuition or logic.

completedHtml: Thank you for completing the Processing Assessment!
